definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Everywhere we went, the French were grand to us.
sentences.chinese: 我們到處受到法國人的熱情接待。

sentences.english: During the Second World War the béret became a symbol of French Patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 到了二戰期間，貝雷帽成爲法國人愛國的標誌。

sentences.english: Tremblay is a native French speaker, fluent English speaker and is conversant in Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 馬大夫是法國人，可以說流利的英語和漢語。

sentences.english: I knew him for a Frenchman.
sentences.chinese: 我認出他是一名法國人。

sentences.english: The French are seldom interested in unusual combinations or surprise presentations.
sentences.chinese: 法國人對不常見的配搭或是奇怪的菜式鮮有興趣。

sentences.english: The essence of French savoir-vivre is simplicity.
sentences.chinese: 法國人的處世之道的實質就是淳樸。

sentences.english: The Frenchman has been transfer listed for more than a season following Diego Cavalieri's move to Liverpool in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 法國人轉會到利物浦比卡瓦雷利要早一個賽季。

sentences.english: A draw between Mexico and Uruguay in their final match would put the 1998 champions and 2006 runners-up out.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥和烏拉圭只要打平就可以做掉法國人。

sentences.english: The French try to sell us their image as great lovers.
sentences.chinese: 法國人想把他們的形象作爲大情種兜售給我們。

sentences.english: What he says unconsciously reveals the French romance in his nature.
sentences.chinese: 言語中，科裏法國人的浪漫情懷不禁自然流露。

sentences.english: French and Americans lived together in fear the Nazis would return.
sentences.chinese: 法國人和美國人住在一起，害怕納粹軍隊會攻回來。

sentences.english: Chic French is not the pursuit of life.
sentences.chinese: 瀟灑的法國人並非沒有人生追求。

sentences.english: Shanghai Portrait France who prefer the bars on Hengshan cleavage sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 上海人像法國人，偏愛衡山路上的酒吧劈情操。

sentences.english: Old Biloxi was settled by the French in1699. Population, 46, 319.
sentences.chinese: 老比洛克西是1699年由法國人建立的。

sentences.english: Ludovic Gortais from France, Engineer of BOBST GROUP, is studying Mandarin in Moren Education.
sentences.chinese: 法國人，博斯特工程師，現在我校學習中文。

sentences.english: They assumed I was French from my surname .
sentences.chinese: 他們從我的姓推測我是法國人。

definition: Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]
